site_data.prompt:
For the sites ${products}
Generate the following commands and give me every command again with its answer:
1-Give me a good hook title for the site comparing those products, and don't just include the names of more than two products
2-give me a good seo description for the site
3-Give me the best practice keywords to include in this site for seo as a python list

site_introduction.prmopt: For a site that is comparing between the products ${products} generate a good introduction optimized for seo, and avoid including all the products names in it

site_conclusion.prmopt: For a site that is comparing between the products ${products} generate a good conclusion optimized for seo, and avoid including all the products names in it

features.prompt: Give me a list of 5 or 4 features for the ${product} in a python list

UI&UX.prompt: Based on users opinions, give me a general sense about the user interface and user experience with ${product}

summary.prompt: Imagine you are an affiliate marketeer, your have to convince people to buy the products you're marketing, your job now is generating a summary for ${product}, this summary should include pros & cons of the product, and a conclusion. You should list the pros and cons as python list

no..site_title: good explaining title for the page

product_name.Pricing: ignore it since it will be a screenshot from the actual website
